Asking her sister so she walked into the bathroom where she was applying makeup "Hey Tonya can I borrow some of your clothes" she asked very politely. "Why do you ne-" she was shocked at what she saw her sister was bigger than her in every way as she was 5'6 and had C cups she now had to look up 4 inches to see her sister as opposed to 4 inches down. "Well I can't fit into any of mine as you can tell" she said boasting about her new size "I'm not sure I have anything that will fit you but you're welcome to look" she said now slouching and looking away in a saddened state. Jen felt bad for her but didn't have time to worry about her now or she would be late it was obvious to her that her bras wouldn't fit she has bigger boobs but she dug through Tonya's clothes until she found a shirt that was very baggy on Tonya but not for Jen on Jen it was a perfect fit. She also found a pair of big jeans in her clothes the jeans looked like skinny jeans on her though with her adventure through Tonya's clothes over she walked to school with Tonya.

Tonya kept eyeing Jen up and down every time she would look away the entire walk to school trying to figure out how she got so big and if she was going to get bigger. This was having opposite effects in both of them as this made Jen's ego skyrocket while Tonya just wanted to hide luckily for her they only shared a school not any classes the only time she would see her is at lunch. Soon they made to school and got to their classes everybody tried to talk to Jen the guys were flirting and the girls were gawking this was great for her but Tonya just dipped off into the crowd of people talking to Jen and their days continued normally until 4 hours into the day Jen started to feel a pain in her stomach. She tried to not say anything for as long as she could but eventually it got so bad she couldn't even ask if she could leave she just took off running to the nearest bathroom and locked herself in and eventually the pain reached a top and she started to grow again.
153.title: 5'10" tall with D cups

choices: Bite the bullet and go to school
Go to the doctor and try to find out how this happened
Stay home and “get accustomed” to her new body
155.content:
“AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!”

Jen’s scream rang throughout the house. Her sister Tonya ran into her room to invesigate.

“Jen! What’s wrong; why all the... oof!”

Tonya fell to the floor in a daze from whatever she collided with. It felt like she’d ran into a brick wall.

Tonya looked up to see the biggest person she’d ever seen towering over her. For a moment she was scared, before she noticed the giantess in front of her looked familiar.

Her scrawny little sister’s face now sat on a body befitting a Norse goddess.

Her hips looked to be two feet across. Her shoulders were nearly just as broad. Connecting the two were a comparatively diminutive ribcage and waist, though still much larger than the average woman.

Her limbs looked thick and powerful as well, but in perfect harmony with the rest of her titanic frame.

But what overshadowed all those impressive measurements were her mammoth breasts which were easily the size of volleyballs.

She had the look of voluptuous beauty coupled with the imposing aura of a stone colossus.

“Jen!? What the hell happened to you?”

“I don’t know,” Jen said almost in tears. “I just woke up like this!”

Tonya was dumbstruck. She’d never even imagined a woman could ever be this big, let alone her 13-year-old runt of a sister. And especially not in one night.

“Where’s Mom?”

“She has a meeting with her editor all day,” Tonya answered. “She already left.”

“Man, Mom’s gonna freak out,” Jen fretted. “How am I going to explain this?”

“It’ll be alright.” Tanya took her sister by the hand in an attempt to reassure her. She was shocked to see that even Jen’s hands were huge, making Tonya’s look like a child’s.

“Jeez, you’re big. I wonder how tall you are.”

“How would I know?” Jen blurted out, acting a bit offended.

“Well, let’s find out,” Tonya said as she lead Jen across the room.

There was a height chart taped up on the bathroom door jamb from when they were little that’d never been taken down. Jen obliged and stood at the door.

“Now stand straight,” Tonya said as she got up on a stool to read the measurement.

“Six foot six exactly.”

Jen started pacing the room in nervous fear. “This is impossible! How could I grow 16 inches overnight?!”

“I don’t know, but for as much as you’ve grown up, I’d say you’ve grown out even more.” Tonya said as she surveyed her sister’s overbearing frame. “Hang on a sec.”

Tonya ran to the other room and came back with a cloth measuring tape.

Tonya stepped behind her sister and looped the tape around her, measuring first her hips, then her waist, noting the results in her head. She had trouble reaching up to encircle Jen’s breasts, not to mention almost running out of tape.

Tonya whistled in surprise.

“55-31-53”

“Christ, I’m huge,” Jen said while tentatively hefting her breasts. “I don’t even want to know what I weigh.”

“Well I do,” Tonya said, gesturing to the bathroom. “So march on in there...big, big lady.”

Jen reluctantly stepped into the bathroom and shut the door. After a minute or two, Tonya started to get impatient.

“What’s it say?”

Jen mumbled something Tonya couldn’t make out.

“What was that?”

“I said I can’t see it because my giant boobs are in the way!”

Tonya groaned and forced her way in. Their bathroom was cramped enough without an emotionally unstable amazon hogging all the space. She was able to contort to a position where she could read the scale.

“225 lbs.”

“WHAT!?” Jen bellowed, shaking the tiny room. “I’ve never weighed more than 95 pounds in my life! Gawd, I’m a freak!”

Tonya was a little scared. Jen could be a real pain when she got worked up; and that was before she got to be this size. She needed to calm her down before she broke something. Or somone.

“All that growing must’ve made you hungry. Maybe some breakfast will clear your head.”

...

The kitchen looked like a war zone. In the span of 30 minutes Jen devoured everything she could get her sizable hands on. Their mom was planning a big dinner for when their brother Mike came home from college this weekend; now everything that wasn’t raw or frozen was gone.

At least Jen wasn’t freaking out anymore. Now she was just sulking at the table, wrapped up in her bedspread that barely contained her.

“What am I going to do? I can’t face everyone at school looking like this. Not to mention Mom and Dad.”

Tonya didn’t have any answers, but she knew she had to do something, and fast.

“Well first things first, we need to find you some clothes.”

“Really?“

“Sure, I was gonna blow off school today anyway. This way I’ll have an excuse. ‘My sister grew humongous overnight and I had to help.’”

Jen stood up in excitement, accidentally letting the bedspread drop to the floor; instantly killing her mood, and also flashing her sister for the hundredth time.

“I can’t go outside like this!”

“Well, Maybe some of Dad’s clothes will fit you for now. C’mon, let’s hit the mall!”

...

Their mom had given Tonya a credit card in case of emergencies, and this was probably the only time buying clothes counted as an emergency.

Jen felt ridiculous. Her dad’s baggiest T-shirt and shorts amounted to little more than a bikini on her, thanks to her massive butt and breasts taking up all the available space. She hurried along as fast as she could manage with her heels hanging a good two inches out the back of her dad’s sandals.

The mall was relatively empty on a weekday morning. Other than few old ladies, Jen and Tonya made it to the various shops unnoticed.

By them time they’d made their rounds, Jen had enough clothes to get her through the week. A clerk was even able to dig around in the storeroom and find her a bra that fit. By the time they got home Jen was in a much better mood, though she was a bit distraught to learn she now had size 14 feet.

Jen had a choice on how to spend the rest of her day:
155.title: 6'6" tall with H cups

choices: Tonya doesn't want to wait, and tries to drag Jen out with her.
1552.content:
Ultimately, Jen thought it would be a good idea to go to the doctor and try to find out just how she grew 16 inches seemingly overnight. She knew she was going to have to face her parents with this news eventually, so she figured it would be nice to have an explanation for their sake. And she'd owe it to her brother Mike, too, when he came home this weekend. Of course, if all the doctor could tell her was that she was huge, Jen was going to be very upset and annoyed over having wasted her time.

"Tonya? I think I should go to the doctor. Maybe they can tell me how the heck this is even possible? So...could you drive me there?" Jen asked her older sister in an almost pleading tone.

Tonya for her part had been planning on spending the rest of the day watching TV and listening to her music, after cleaning up the terrible mess in the kitchen, but Jen's request sounded reasonable. She replied, not wanting to get her bigger younger sister upset again but still trying to hide that fact from her, "Alright, fine. But after this you're helping me replace all the food you ate and clean up this mess!"

Jen shrugged and accepted the deal. It wasn't like it would be any different otherwise, and her new size might just make some of the tasks ahead less of a chore. So the two left the house again in Tonya's car and then drove to the local hospital. It was just a few blocks, so it wasn't a long drive.

Once they arrived at the hospital, Jen got out of Tonya's car and walked towards the doors for the walk-in clinic. She hardly felt as though her...condition was an emergency, as she wasn't bleeding everywhere or anything like that, so she had no intention of going into the emergency room for this. She entered with Tonya soon joining her, registered an appointment, and then took a seat.

About 10 minutes later, the doctor called Jen's name, and the dirty-blonde haired amazonian teen went into the doctor's examination room.

Dr. Tia Fairweathers was looking forward to seeing Jen again, considering she was the family doctor. She found Jen to be a bright and caring young teen, if a little obsessed about the growth spurt she was due for recently. She expected that Jen was seeking reassurance that it would come soon enough. What Dr. Fairweathers wasn't expecting however, was to see a buxom, towering young woman waiting for her. "Oh my... What happened to you, Jen?" she asked, having to look up to meet Jen's eyes.

"Um...I grew. Like a lot. Overnight. I...was kind of hoping you could tell me how this happened, Dr. Fairweathers." Jen replied sheepishly. She was getting used to her size, but was still a bit nervous over the matter.

Dr. Fairweathers nodded and replied, "Er, y-yes, I see that. Well, if you will just take off your shoes we can start getting to the bottom of this by going over the scales."

Jen complied and a few minutes later her measurements were recorded. Still 6'6" tall, 225 lbs, and 55-31-53 as she was this morning when Tonya measured her. Dr. Fairweathers then took Jen's blood pressure and listened to her heart and her lungs. After checking Jen's ears and her throat, she tested Jen's reflexes which elicited a raised eyebrow from both females.

"That's...not normal, is it?" Jen asked in surprise at how far her leg had kicked at the tap of the small mallet.

"Very unusual, yes. But another test is in order I think." Dr. Fairweathers answered as she retrieved her yard stick. Knowing what was coming, Jen held out her hand ready to try and grab the yard stick as it would fall through her hand. She had always done reasonably well with this, but was shocked at her reaction time once the test was performed. It seemed almost superhuman how quickly she had grabbed it and how easily she was handling holding it at the very end with just her thumb and forefinger.

"Huh. Guess that means I'd be a star at dodge-ball then..." Jen remarked.

Dr. Fairweathers pulled out a syringe and said, "Well, I think we're going to need a blood sample to figure this out now. Aside from how much you've grown, you're as healthy as a horse. I'd dare say that you make horses seem rather sickly by comparison!"

Jen shuddered slightly at the needle. She never liked them. The last time she got a flu shot, she was sick as a dog for a full week when normally she would feel almost fully recovered, if a tad weak, by that time. But still, this was important, so she reluctantly agreed and looked the other way, bracing herself. Dr. Fairweathers tried to pierce Jen's skin, but found it resisting far more than it should.

Eventually, she managed to get her blood sample and remarked, "I'd swear I'd have an easier time trying to stick a brick wall with this... I'll get this looked at immediately. Would you care to stick around for a little while longer? You can help yourself to the cafeteria or the vending machine if you'd like something to eat."

"Uh, sure! I don't mind." Jen said, also a little surprised at how resilient her skin had proven to be just now. And all it did was make her more curious as to how this happened, seemingly overnight no less...
1552.title: Go to the doctor.

choices: Jen decides to test her new powers with a bit of growth.
Jen decides to enjoy the rest of the day as she is.
15522.content:
Jen went back out into the waiting room and told Tonya she was going to stick around for a while longer while the tests on her blood were done. Her older sister groaned at this and said, "If I knew this was gonna take awhile, I would have brought my iPod..."

Jen knew the little teal rectangular device of which Tonya spoke of. She could almost envision it in her own pocket right now... Not that the sisters shared the same tastes in music, of course. Jen reached down to her shorts pocket and was surprised when she found a familiar rectangular bulge there. "You mean this thing?" she asked and pulled the iPod out.

Tonya's eyes went wide as she said, "My iPod! But what the hell are you doing with it, twerp?" instinctively insulting Jen despite the considerable size difference against her favor, with her sister bearing a body that quite possibly could grind Tonya's bones to make bread. Or at least snap her femurs like they were twigs.

"Don't call me a twerp!" Jen snapped back and then added, "Besides, I don't know why I have your stupid iPod in the first place. I imagined having it to give to you to shut you up, and suddenly I find it in my brand new pocket! I haven't even had time to rummage through your room, and it's not like I'd go unnoticed by you given how freaking huge I am!"

Jen handed the device over and left the waiting room to grab something out of the vending machine. As she did, she started cooling off and also started to wonder. Just how did she manage to produce that from her pocket? She knew she didn't have it when they left, and she had only thought about having it so she could keep Tonya happy so she wouldn't end up walking home.

Her thoughts ended when she got to the machine and realized she hadn't any money with her: she had left her wallet in her room at home. She imagined having the pink object in her pocket so she could buy something...and then felt an odd weight in the pocket on the side she usually kept her wallet in when she went out. She reached in and pulled out...her wallet!

"But I left this at home! How the heck did I do that?" Jen exclaimed, albeit delighted that she could afford her Aero bar and bottle of Coke. She put in the money...only for the machine to spit it back out into the coin return. She glared at the machine and tried again, saying, "Accept it, damn it!"

And to her surprise, the machine happily accepted her change. Now Jen was getting suspicious that she was somehow able to influence reality or something. But for now, she was just happy to have her snack and headed back into the waiting room, sitting back down beside Tonya. While she wasn't exactly hungry, Jen still found comfort in devouring the Aero bar like had never seen a chocolate bar before and drinking her bottle of Coke.

About an hour later, Jen was getting worried that the tests were going to take longer than Dr. Fairweathers had predicted, and that they were wasting their time. She imagined the 6 foot tall woman that was her family doctor coming to inform her of the test results. And not a minute after, she could hear the familiar clack of Dr. Fairweathers' high heel shoes against the tiled floor outside the carpeted waiting room approaching.

The doctor came in holding a few sheets of paper and said, "Jen? I have the results. Would you care to join me so we can discuss them?"

Jen nodded as she finished off her Coke and got up. She threw out the now empty bottle in the trash and then followed Dr. Fairweathers into the examination room. Once the doctor closed the door behind her, Jen asked, "So? What's the results? Is there something I should worry about, or does it say nothing we don't already know?"

Dr. Fairweathers shook her head and replied, "On the contrary, the results prove to be very interesting. Normally, the human body can't withstand such a massive growth spurt all at once. Some of the tallest people in the world to have ever lived have died fairly young due to complications tying into their size. You, however, are different. Your DNA seems to be specially coded to actually become stronger the larger you become. Normally this piece of genetic code would be dormant, as going back to your previous blood tests I've discovered this gene present in them as well, but now it's become active. It also appears to be dedicated to making your body grow, and some other things that we haven't discovered yet.

"However, I have no idea why it's become active. Perhaps you've triggered it through your sheer desire to have that growth spurt you were waiting for?" Dr. Fairweathers suggested, and then said, "Other than that, I'm afraid that's all I can tell you...unless there's something else you'd like to tell me?"

Jen nodded and replied, "Yeah. That stupid vending machine refused my quarters when I tried putting them in the first time. I told it to accept them and it did."

Tia wrote down what she was told and said, "Well the rejecting part isn't uncommon. It does tend to be picky with what coins are inserted. Why, just before I came to deliver this, it wouldn't take the last quarter needed to buy a bag of M&M's!"

Jen thought this was a good time to show her doctor what she meant. She said, "Just the regular kind? I think I can save you the trouble..." she focused her imagination on having a bag of M&M's from the vending machine, and the required change in the machine so she wouldn't feel like stealing. Less than a minute after, she pulled out a bag of M&M's from her pocket and handed it over to the now wide-eyed doctor. "I don't know how I can do that, I just can. I don't think I can make myself smaller though. Thanks for the information, doctor." Jen said and then headed out.
15522.title: The tests are conclusive.

choices: Enhanced Strength as expected and Mind Reading powers
Just enhanced strength and some size powers. Nothing else is New from earlier
155221.content:
As Jen goes to head out the doctor stops her.

"Please if you wouldn't mind could you come with me and just indulge me in a few more tests" Dr.Fairweathers pleaded.


Jen and Tonya stopped and exchanged unsure glances.


"O-okay I guess" Jen reluctantly agreed. Both girls followed the doctor to her office.


"Okay first try changing size if you would" the doctor requested.


"Well okay I guess. I wish these things weren't so freakishly huge" said Jen motioning to her mammoth mounds.

A few moments later all 3 of them watched shocked as Jen's breasts began to shrink. The stopped at what would of been a Mid C Cup were she normal sized and not an Amazoness.


"Well at least I can see past my chest now" said Jen. However something else was happening. Jen's body was starting grow. At least this time her body responded to her wishes as everything grew in perfect even proportions. Her clothes grew tight once more as she gained another 17 inches on her previous height.


Her head was just inches from the ceiling when the growth stopped. Tonya couldn't believe how much of a goddess her 13 year was becoming.





They decided to test for anymore powers besides the 2 they had already discovered and learn the results are...
155221.title: Jen decides to test her new powers with a bit o...

choices: Jen grows a bit in her sleep.
Jen wakes up the next day, still 6'6" tall.
155222.content:
Jen found herself actually somewhat elated at her recent development of being able to apparently will something to happen. She didn't know what the extent of this was, but she had a few ideas for the near future as to how to try to make use of it. Like, if she wasn't done growing, she probably could make her clothes keep up with her. And even take care of some of those human needs like eating, drinking, and going to the bathroom. No more long lineups to the girls' room at the mall! Jen decided to do the last part right away and eliminate that need.

"Alrighty then! Tonya, let's go already! You said you wanted me to help you replace all the food I ate this morning and clean up, right?" Jen said with slight enthusiasm.

Tonya groaned at this, and proceeded to try and swat her younger sister, only to hit Jen's arm. As a result, Tonya was reminded once again of the well built 6'6" goddess of a girl her 13 year old sister had become, given how it felt like she had tried to swat a rock. Jen hadn't even flinched. Tonya finally got up and the two proceeded to leave. "Of all the things that could happen...why do you have to be a freaking giantess?!" she complained as they entered the parking lot.

Jen smirked with amusement and replied, "Oh, I'm big alright, but a giantess? I don't qualify for that title...yet. Although that does sound like a cool idea now that I think about it... I mean, apparently something in my DNA has become active when it was dormant before. I just might end up growing even bigger than this!"

Tonya gulped at the scary (to her) thought. As she started the car, she asked, "And just this morning you were wailing about being a freak. What's with the sudden mood change?"

"Duh. I've gotten over the shock of being this big. I quite like it now! And I'm sure others will understand. But if you want me to go back to moping about how I'm some sort of huge freak, I could arrange it too..." Jen replied with a bit of a smile, knowing full well that her older sister really didn't want that at all.

Several minutes later, Jen and Tonya stopped at the grocery store to replace all the food Jen had eaten this morning. Which was nearly everything that wasn't raw or frozen. While shopping, Jen enjoyed the stares she received, especially the ones of awe over the ones of slight fear. She could also remember most of the things she had gotten her sizable hands around in the kitchen at home, so the two girls had something to go by. It actually alarmed Jen to a degree just how much stuff she had eaten, and made her determined to not eat that much again.

This was especially true once they got to the checkout. Once they got out, with Jen carrying most of the grocery bags and with little trouble, Tonya stated, "Well I think I've just set a record for the shortest amount of time to max out a credit card... I'm probably gonna be paying off this bill for years, so if you wreck those clothes, you're on your own, Jen."

Jen felt a little bad about all of this, but then there was also little she could have done about it in the first place. Then again, she probably could make that bill go away or at least lighten the burden...but she would leave that to be a surprise for Tonya later.

Once they got home, Jen and Tonya brought the groceries in, (mostly Jen) and then started cleaning up the mess from this morning. Jen found it actually pretty easy with her size and strength, and the two managed to make the kitchen look almost completely untouched. At least, no evidence of the disaster from this morning anyway.

Later in the afternoon, Jen received a phone call from Lucy, one of her best friends from school. She was calling out of concern for her friend, as Jen hadn't turned up at school today. Jen told Lucy that she had went to the doctor today, and that she had something to show her tomorrow, but let Lucy in on nothing else to save the surprise.

In the evening, Jen and Tonya's father, James, returned home from another busy day at work. The man was so tired, he remained oblivious to the fact that his youngest child, his little girl, now towered over him by about half a foot and outweighed him by about 45 lbs. They ate dinner together, and then James turned in for the night soon after. Their mother, Gwen, arrived home later, having eaten out after her meeting with her editor. Her editor's treat since both women had went straight through lunch with little more than coffee. As such, she hung up her coat, put the papers from her most recent project into her office, and then wished her daughters good night as she turned in herself.

At bedtime, Jen realized that she and Tonya had forgotten to get pajamas for her, leaving her with just her ruined set from this morning. Undaunted, she imagined them good as new and sized perfectly to fit her, and soon they had done exactly what she wanted. She put them on, crawled into bed, and then went to sleep.
155222.title: The rest of the day.

choices: 6'7 feet tall and Still growing slowly?
1552221.content:
Jen crawled into her bed and went to sleep. It didn't take her long to fall fast asleep and it seemed like with all that growing she did today, caused her to fall into a nice deep sleep. But unknowing to either her or her older sister Tonya. Jen wasn't done growing yet, not by a long shot... she was about to have a repeat act of what happen this morning, tomorrow morning... Slowly Jen grew in size and bust while sleeping in her bed. The young 13-year old was 6'6 feet tall, with a H-cup sized bust. But when Jen was going to wake up, she was going to have a whole new set of measurements...

The next morning...

Jen was awoke to the peaking sunlight , she let out a strong yawn and a even stronger stretch. Though as she stretched, she could hear her shredded clothes ripping and tearing even more. She stopped mid stretch and looked at her surroundings, things did look higher and her stuff did look smaller, but she was 6'6 feet tall, so everything already did have a different perspective to her. She thought to herself, 'Di-did I grow again? I my God I really hope not!' Jen rolled out of bed and walked over to her dresser mirror and couldn't get a accurate reading from the reflection, she was already tall and her clothes were already shredded from her last growth spurt, then she remembered the tape measure and decided to pull the thing out. She marked her height on the door frame and to her horror her new height was?
1552221.title: Sleeping does the Body Good

1552222.content:
Jen woke up to the sound of her alarm clock going off the next day. She yawned and tapped the snooze button before turning it off. The weight on her chest and looking into the mirror on her bedroom wall confirmed that yesterday hadn't been some weird dream. She really was 6'6" tall with practically the proportions of a Norse goddess. She grinned, having already gotten used to this sight from yesterday and being more than ready to show off the new her to her school. But first, her mom and dad. Yes, they had seen her yesterday evening when they returned home, but they had both been understandably much too tired to pay any attention to her new size then.

"Jen, it's time to get up and get ready for school!" her mom, Gwen, called from the other side of the door, and then she heard her mom say, "Tonya, that means you too!"

Jen returned the call with, "Okay, mom!" and then got dressed in yesterday's attire. It was still within the school dress code, and not even the bulkiest sweater would really be able to disguise her volleyball sized breasts. Besides, it was much too warm around this time of year for such a thing. Summer was just around the corner, and summer vacation along with it.

She managed to get into the bathroom before Tonya did, and proceeded to brush her long hair. About a minute into this, Tonya banged on the door and yelled, "Hurry up in there, you twerp! I've gotta go!"

Jen mostly ignored this and finished brushing her hair. She often had to wait for Tonya to be finished with the bathroom with her own legs crossed while her older sister took her sweet time, so it was only appropriate that Jen repaid the favor in kind. Finally, she opened the door and stepped out, making Tonya's eyes widen before rushing into the bathroom. Jen called in after her, "Still not a twerp, sis!" figuring that her older sister had also thought yesterday to have just been a dream before the truth presented itself.

To Jen's disappointment when she came downstairs into the kitchen, her dad James had already left for today's meeting. On the other hand, her mom was sipping away at her coffee at the table while reading a newspaper. Jen grabbed a spoon, a bowl, and a box of Sugar Crisp to have for breakfast. She put the cereal away after pouring herself a bowl and then got out the milk, putting it away after she was done before digging in.

Working at home had some advantages for Gwen, one of which included being able to see her daughters off on their way to school. As well as making sure that they actually left for school, which she knew from going over the messages left on the answering machine that they hadn't yesterday while she had been at the meeting with her editor.

Once she was done eating, Jen said, "Morning, mom!" just as Gwen was taking another sip from her coffee.

Naturally, this caught Gwen's attention. She looked up from her paper to greet her 13 year old daughter back...only to suddenly swallow in shock and subsequently end up coughing when her coffee went down the wrong way as she saw Jen clearly much bigger than two days ago. Now that she thought about it, something did seem a bit off about Jen last night, but had been too tired to paid much mind to it then. "G-good morning, dear." she managed.

As Jen got up to put her bowl and spoon away in the dishwasher, Gwen took this opportunity to get up with the excuse of getting another cup of coffee to compare herself with her youngest daughter. Gwen herself had a slender body, maintained through jogging whenever she could spare some time away from her computer, and C-cup breasts that almost bordered into the D-cup range thanks to having three kids three years apart from each other. She was also about 5'8" tall. She hadn't touched a weight in years. Yet her daughter's body completely put her to shame. Finally, she asked, "How...how is this possible?"

Jen answered as Tonya slipped into the kitchen to have some breakfast herself, "I had a growth spurt yesterday! Shocked the heck out of me when I woke up. I went to the doctor to find out how it was possible I grew 16 inches overnight, and she ran some blood tests. She discovered that there's like a gene or something in my DNA responsible that was dormant before. I've got the papers if you want to read them."

Gwen thought that her daughter was pulling her leg, until the amazonian teen quickly retrieved the papers with the test results on them which confirmed her story. "So is this why you and Tonya were absent at school yesterday?" she asked, making Tonya pause in her inhalation of her breakfast.

"Um...yeah. Sorry... Just wanted to be sure it wasn't anything to worry about, and by the time the tests were done the school day was over halfway over with so we didn't think it was worth going." Jen admitted, and braced for the punishment.

However, her mom shook her head and responded, "I should punish the two of you for skipping school, but... I'll let it slip just this once. Now get moving, young ladies, before I reconsider."

Jen inwardly cheered, and then said as she grabbed her backpack, "Can do! Oh, and before I forget... The doctor said that I might not be finished growing, but my body should be able to handle it." Jen and Tonya then bid their goodbyes to their mom and immediately headed outside to catch the bus.
1552222.title: Jen wakes up the next day, still 6'6" tall.

choices: Continue the rest of the school day.

"What? The military?" Jen questioned.

"No. Your friends! If they see you...!" Tonya replied with a bit of a panic.

Jen sighed and said, "They're gonna see me eventually, since it's getting harder to hide as I get bigger... Go talk to them and we'll see how they react when we get there. Please?"

Once again, Tonya complied. If Jen were normal sized, Tonya would tell her to get stuffed even after saying please. "Alright, fine. I'm going!" she said and stormed off into the house to answer the door. "Yes? You're Jen's friends, right?" she asked after opening the door.

"That's right. I'm Lucy, and this is Gary. Can we speak to Jen?" Lucy asked. Lucy was the same age as Jen and was the same (original) height as her at 5'2", but had somewhat bigger breasts (originally) at barely C-cups. Gary was a year older than Jen at 14 and two inches taller than Lucy at 5'4".

Tonya hesitated, considering to tell them to buzz off, but instead she opened the door and said, "S-sure. Come inside. Leave your shoes by the door so you don't track stuff in."

The two went inside and took off their shoes as asked. Gary asked, "Uh, is Jen in her room? She wasn't at school today so we came to check up on her."

Tonya led the two younger teens into the kitchen, and then responded, "No, she's...outside. But I gotta ask, just how close are you guys with Jen? Are you willing to accept her no matter what?"

Lucy and Gary looked at each other, puzzled as to what the 16 year old was getting at, and then Gary answered, "We've been best friends with her since first grade. Well, second for me, but you get the point."

Lucy also replied, "We'd be willing to accept our friend no matter what comes up! Why? Does she have a huge ugly pimple on her face or something?"

Tonya sighed. There was no putting it off any further. "Um...no, not like that... Come on, you'll see outside. Just don't freak out." she said and led them out into the back yard.

Once they were outside, Lucy and Gary didn't see anything at first. But then they heard thunderous steps coming from the nearby woods. Soon Jen came out of the forest, approaching her house which she was now officially taller than, and then knelt down in front of her friends. "Hi guys..." she said gently in hopes of not scaring the living crap out of them more than she was already. Both of her friends were slack-jawed at the sight of her.

"Holy crap... Jen, you're everything is huge!" Lucy managed to say to her now giantess friend.

"...Yeah... How...how big were you this morning?" Gary said, a little distracted by the biggest set of breasts he had ever seen in his life, and naked no less.

Tonya replied, "This morning? About 6'6" tall, 225 lbs, and size 14 feet. For the really juicy details... A 31 inch waist, 53 inch hips, and to top it off, 55 inch bust. H-cups. Nearly ran out of tape to measure those things, not to mention reaching that high was a pain..."

Jen blushed a bit as Tonya listed off her various measurements to Lucy and Gary. The 70 foot tall dirty-blonde haired blue eyed girl knew Gary would have asked anyway, but it didn't make it any less embarrassing...despite not giving enough of a care to even try for modesty in front of her friends. "I always knew I'd have at least one more growth spurt before I was done growing. Just, I didn't know that when it finally did hit I'd be growing all day, fluctuating between a snail's pace and, well, this pace."

"Do...do you know what is causing you to grow like this? And could you please cover up?" Lucy asked.

Jen shook her head and replied, "Nope, no idea. I didn't go to the doctor's today, as I don't need to be told the obvious. And I'm afraid I can't cover up, Lucy. Even if I could find something to cover myself up with, I'd eventually outgrow it. I've kind of given up on modesty because of that."

Jen rose to her full height of roughly 80 feet currently and stretched. After a minute she realized...
1553212.title: Jen's friends visit their giantess friend.

15532122.content:
"Um...Is it just me, or am I growing...faster than before?" Jen questioned, hoping that her new 90 foot and climbing viewpoint was just a crazy trick of some sort.

Tonya and Lucy shook their heads, and the former replied, "Afraid not, Jen. You've sped up. ...Don't even think about throwing a fit at your size, Or I'll..."

Jen knelt down again and stared at her sister. The 110 foot tall and climbing bombshell of a girl then asked with a calm, dead serious tone, "Or you'll what? Sit on me? Wrestle me to the ground?" to make her point even more clear, she added, "You can't do anything to me and you damn well know it. You could hardly do anything to me when I was 6'6", what hope in hell do you have now that I'm like 140 feet tall and still growing?"

Jen then relaxed and said, "I'm not interested in throwing a fit over what was gonna happen eventually. Besides, why would I want to leave that kind of impression on my friends? I'm a big girl, not a big baby!"

"More like goddess..." Gary added unhelpfully as he continued to stare at Jen as she grew.

"Not...helping...!" Lucy hissed at her friend who was entranced with Jen's magnificent growing body...though she had to admit that Jen was turning her on just a little.

Jen however shrugged her shoulders as she surpassed 170 feet and stated, "I guess if you want to look at it like that... Still, it wouldn't be very good if I let this freak me out and wind up leveling everything in sight. Then the military wouldn't have any compunction at all over nuking me."

A few minutes later, Jen had grown past 200 feet and still showed no signs of slowing down. She tried to hold her growth in, but no matter how hard she tried, her efforts were futile; her body just kept right on growing as though nothing was happening. "Well so much for that idea. I can't stop myself from growing even if I wanted to." she said with mild defeat.

"But why would you want to do that?" asked Gary, which earned him stares from all three girls including the growing one.

"Uh, so I don't break anything by growing into it? Or by accidentally stepping on it? Yes, I admit I'm enjoying the growing experience, but if I have to be a giantess, then damn it I want to be a nice one that tries to cause as little damage as possible." the now 240 foot tall Jen answered.

"Look, I've still got some cleaning up to do from this morning before mom comes home, so I'm going back inside to do that. And then? Maybe a nap to help me cope with this really weird day." Tonya said to Jen and her friends, and then went back inside.

Jen hollered behind her sister, "That's fine, as I just so happen to be going through a really weird day, too!"

After a few minutes, Jen had reached a height of 300 feet tall, and still wasn't slowing down. The nearby woods would no longer be able to provide cover for the gigantic teen, and soon not even a forest of redwood trees would. Jen was...surprisingly at peace with this. If she could no longer have anywhere to hide, then she would simply have to make do without it. The people of the world would just have to deal with a growing, naked (albeit friendly) giantess in their midst. Hopefully not by trying to kill her...if it was even possible to kill her now.

Lucy called up to Jen and said to her 360 foot tall friend, "Hey, Jen? You're...kinda getting a little too close with your feet. Could you move back a bit?"

"Oh! Sure! I've probably torn up the yard horribly, too... I think I've been heavy enough for awhile now to do that just by growing." Jen replied and stood up. It was rather exhilarating to see that her house only came up to her ankle, give or take, as she continued to grow to 400 feet tall while she moved to give her friends some more breathing room. When she looked down at where she had been, she noticed that the ground was...
15532122.title: Her growth was speeding up.

choices: She freaked out about Jen being huge.
155321222.content:
Surprisingly untouched. Jen could have sworn she felt the earth being shoved by her feet as she grew, and she knew she was more than heavy enough to do so...not to mention leave footprints wherever she stepped. She asked, "You guys are seeing this, right? The total lack of damage to the yard?"

Lucy forced Gary's head downward to look at the ground and away from Jen's house size breasts. He then replied, "How is that possible?! I can't see even the faintest impression of where your feet were!"

As Jen grew past 420 feet, she said in confusion, "I don't know... I'm grateful, but it doesn't mean that much unless..."

Lucy thought she knew what her gigantic friend was getting at and waved her arms out in front of her as she stated, "Oh no! I'm not volunteering to be squished by my friend!" she glared at Gary until he agreed with her to not volunteer for what Jen was thinking.

Jen smiled and answered, "I'm not asking for a human volunteer. You guys are way too important to me! I'll use a tree to try this out on."

The 440 foot tall (and still growing) girl made her way back into the woods. Jen was thankful that she was so big that none of the trees reached her crotch now, as she didn't want to even think about what would happen if one did manage to reach there. Soon she found a tree right about in the middle and gave it a shove. As expected, it was very quickly creaking and bending, seemingly about to break. She relented and did what she could to right it again. Finally, Jen casually leaned her hand against it without focusing on trying to do anything to the tree. This time the tree didn't even budge. Satisfied, she waded back out, having grown to 500 feet during that time.

"So, what's the news, Jen?" Lucy asked curiously.

"Seems like I can only actually harm anything if I'm focusing on doing it. In short, if I break something, it's not by accident. Not even gonna think about what that means for anything I eat. Granted I haven't eaten anything since breakfast and I'm still not hungry, so I guess I don't really need to worry about it." Jen replied.

"But what about, um...you know..." Gary questioned.

Jen stretched her 540 foot tall body and then answered, "If someone were to manage to get in there, they'd probably survive if I'm not focused on hurting them. Would definitely need a bath and a change of clothes once they're flushed out. I'd hate to be the guy that would have to clean the building I had used to pleasure myself with, but it'd be still standing if I didn't want to wreck it."

Jen paused for a minute as her body grew past 580 feet, and added, "No, I'm not planning on doing any of these things. I'm naked? Fine. I'm growing? Fine. I'm the frigging hottest thing to roam the Earth? More than fine. But using people and buildings to pleasure myself? Not fine!"

While Gary seemed a bit disappointed that Jen refused to budge on her stance, Lucy was grateful for Jen's consideration. She wasn't sure, however, that she could resist such temptations herself if she were in Jen's place as the growing giantess. But after awhile, the thought got her curious, so she asked, "What's it like, being a giantess?"

Jen gently picked up her friends so that she could see them better at her current height of 700 feet and replied, "It's scary at first, but now that I'm used to it, this is amazing! And the feeling of growth...you don't know how incredible it feels, trust me! Really, I've been tempted to finger myself several times now, and the only reasons I don't are that I might send my growth into overdrive; and that I probably won't be able to stop once I start."

Just then, Jen's mom came home...
155321222.title: Surprisingly untouched.

choices: Learn to accept it without contest.
Get a doctor's opinion to see if something can be done.
1553212222.content:
Jen was a little surprised about her mom having come home so soon, since her sister Tonya had informed her this morning that their mom was going to be at a meeting with her editor all day. Then again, the giantess could see the Moon faintly in the sky and the Sun starting to set, so maybe not as soon as she thought. Considering her size made her easily viewable from a distance, what with her ankle alone now towering over the home she had been raised in her whole life, Jen knew that the time to face the music had come. She gently set her friends down onto the ground and cautioned, "This might get a bit ugly..."

Gwen had went to a meeting with her editor this morning, which was to last all day. However, she got lucky and they had finished sooner than either woman had expected to take, so Gwen had headed home after stopping over at Starbucks for a cup of coffee. On the way, the radio had reported sightings of a giant woman somewhere in town. She didn't believe them at first, of course. That is, until she saw the giantess in the distance with her own eyes, and very nearly got into an accident when she did.

Gwen's first instinct was naturally to rush home and make sure her girls were safe and sound. Her son's college was well away from the giant woman's current location, and her husband James was out of town for business until the weekend which he fought tooth and nail to have off so he could be with his entire family including his son. So she was slightly less worried about her boys as a result. However, she was horrified to find that the giant woman seemed to be right at her family's home. As she pulled into the driveway, noticing that the giantess' ankle was well above the roof of her house, her horror was replaced with utter shock and stupor when she recognized the giantess' face as her gigantic breasts stopped obstructing the view when she bent down.

The giant, buxom woman...was her little baby girl Jen!

"Oh my gosh..." Gwen said as she stepped out of her car.

Jen bent down over their entire house, her massive breasts accidentally hitting the top of the chimney but causing no discernible damage, and gave a tiny wave as she said, "...Hi, mom."

This however did nothing to soothe Gwen's nerves, and she began freaking out. Jen sighed lightly and picked her mom up in her growing hands, then pulled herself back into the shrinking back yard.

"Jen, what the hell happened to you?! Why the hell do you not have any clothes on?!" Gwen started rambling.

Jen replied, "I can't wear any clothes because I'm too freaking big, mom. I don't know what happened to me, either. I just woke up this morning big and just kept on getting bigger! Still am." she paused and then joked, "Hey, we always knew I was due for another growth spurt soon, right?"

Gwen calmed down slightly, seeing her daughter's point and the tips of her fingers getting further and further away as Jen continued to grow into the 800 foot range and beyond. "Well, I suppose... But can't you stop it?! And just how big were you this morning?! How the hell are we going to afford to feed you?!" she continued, her rational mind having yet to catch up.

"Uh... My body was exactly like it is now, only at 6'6" and 225 lbs. H-cup boobs. And I've tried to stop this. Really, I have. But my body has decided it's gonna grow bigger and bigger whether I want it to or not..." Jen stated, and watched her mom gasp with shock. Even if her growth spurt had stopped there she would easily be the tallest person in their family and in her school, not to mention the most well endowed female in her family and school. A veritable towering sex goddess, all while still at the age of 13. But now she was the biggest living thing ever, still growing, and mentally felt about 16.

Jen continued, "Oddly, I haven't been hungry or thirsty at all since this morning. I...don't even think I need food at this point."

"But..." Gwen started, but had effectively run out of steam for the moment. Her little girl was ginormous, likely 900 feet tall at this point, and still growing. This was like something out of a science fiction novel! She thought that this could make a good basis for a story at some point, but right now she didn't care about her writing.

"Mom? Listen. I've been going through this all day now. I freaked and fretted over it at first, but then I got over it. I'm at peace with this now. I'm even enjoying being a great big huge giantess! If I can get over it and accept what I've become and all that, why can't you? I'm still the same Jen you've always known on the inside." Jen responded finally as she passed 1000 feet.

As for Gwen, she had decided that for her daughter's sake, she was going to...
1553212222.title: Gwen freaked out about Jen being huge.

choices: The results aren't ready yet, but the media is.
15532122222.content:
Get the opinion of a doctor to see if something could be done about Jen's growth. But Gwen recognized that getting the cooperation of her growing giantess daughter could be...difficult. "Jen? Have you been to a doctor at all about this?" she asked.

"Um...no. I don't need a doctor to tell me I'm freaking huge, mom." Jen replied.

"Well we're going now, sweetie." Gwen stated flatly in a tone that suggested she wasn't taking no for an answer, and the titanic teen was going whether she liked it or not.

Jen knew this tone from her mom all too well, and instinct took over. But she at least wanted company if possible, and so said, "Alright, fine, mom... But can at least Tonya and my friends come along?"

Jen lowered her hand to the ground so Gwen could see Lucy and Gary in the back yard with their gigantic friend. "Sure, sweetie. If your friends want to come along, I suppose there's no harm in them doing so. I'll just go get your sister, then..." she responded.

"No need. I'll just wake her up and she'll come out." Jen said with a slightly mischievous smile. She then proceeded to lightly tap the roof over Tonya's bedroom with her finger a few times. Sure enough, her sister came scrambling outside.

Tonya was at first angry over being woken up...until she saw just how big Jen had grown while she was sleeping. "What do you want, Jen?" she asked with only slight annoyance.

"Mom's home and wants me to go to the doctor. And you're coming with us!" Jen replied.

A few minutes later, everyone was ready to go. At 1100 feet tall, but having slowed down in her growth again somewhat, Jen was going to carry her family and friends to the doctor as it would be much faster than them taking a car. As she went, she also took the most direct route so long as it didn't take her through any buildings. She marveled silently at how tiny nearly all of the buildings were to her now, and tried to ignore the screams of terror as she walked past.

"Well here we are. Do you want to head in and get a doctor, or should I just put my hand in there and grab one?" Jen said upon arrival, and then added, "I'm only joking."

Jen let her family and friends down from her hand, and they went inside. As much as she was tempted to just leave...she was kind of curious now what the doctor had to say, provided it wasn't something obvious. At the same time, she wished that she could hurry up and get this visit over with before her growth inevitably picked up speed again.

Soon enough, a doctor came out to see Jen. The doctor asked a few basic questions, and then she said, "Okay, Jen, I'm going to need to take a blood sample. Are you alright with this?"

Jen nodded and replied, "Sure. Um...do you need somewhere that might be easier to stick me?"

At first, the doctor tried to stick her large needle into where she usually would for a patient, but she couldn't get at a blood vessel to draw from. Jen's skin seemed more resilient to being breached, but then she was also over 1100 feet tall. Finally, the doctor answered, "It would seem so. I suppose I could try - WHOA!"

The doctor yelped as Jen picked her up and said, "My mouth, doc? Should be easier in there. I'll give you a minute to try, then you're coming back out." and without waiting for a reply, she stuck the woman into her mouth. She kept her massive tongue angled up towards the roof of her mouth in hopes that the woman wouldn't fall down into her throat.

A minute passed, and Jen let the doctor out of her mouth. The woman was covered in saliva, but she had her blood sample. Much to Jen's relief. The doctor went inside to run some blood work...and shower and change if possible. Her friends and family came back out to comfort her...even if Tonya mostly just wanted to leave and her giant younger sister was her only ticket back home. A few minutes after that, they were told to come back tomorrow for the results, which was fine considering it was getting late. So Jen took them all back home. Lucy and Gary phoned their parents and arranged to stay at Jen's place for the night.

The next day, Gwen assumed that by now most of the town was aware of Jen being the giantess. A now 1200 foot tall girl with Jen's proportions was rather hard to ignore. Gwen did call the school to tell them that her friends wouldn't be attending today due to wanting to be with her daughter. She, Lucy, and Gary then climbed aboard Jen's nearly 71 foot wide hand, and then the titanic girl made her way back over to the hospital.

Once Jen got there with her mom and friends...
15532122222.title: To the doctor!

choices: Jen goes to personally bring her dad and brother home.
Jen sees what else she's capable of.
155321222222.content:
Jen lowered her hand to the ground to allow her mom, Gwen, and her friends to disembark so they could enter and see if the test results were ready yet. She hoped that whatever the results were would be shared with her one way or another, as the gigantic dirty-blonde haired blue eyed girl was rather curious about them now.

Soon, the doctor came out with Jen's mom and friends. She asked the doctor, "Well? What did you find out?"

The doctor replied, "To put it simply, science in general, let alone medical science, has never seen anything like this before. There is no way you should even be alive right now, or even able to move under your own power for that matter. The human body would crush itself under its own weight well before your current size, and even before then, you would be proportionately too heavy to even stand, much less move. Your heart also shouldn't be able to handle the strain your current size would be putting on it. There is also the matter of being able to maintain enough energy to even fuel your growth. You should have starved to death long before now."

Jen hadn't thought about these factors before, but she felt perfectly fine. "So I should be dead by now. That's a pleasing thought... But couldn't you tell me that without a blood sample? I'm not sure I'm following." she stated.

The doctor nodded her head and said, "That's true, Jen. And yet, here you are. I tried to subject your blood, and a small tissue sample I had also acquired from you, to a barrage of different viruses and bacteria. Not one was successful in infecting your cells. Upon further study, it seems that your cells reject any bacterial or viral attempt at invasion, and then destroy the offenders. I also subjected your blood and tissue to a vacuum, the results were quite startling. They continued to function perfectly fine. Somehow...you're beyond human needs. Where your body is getting the energy to sustain itself is unknown, as is how this came to be, but your body seems to have become perfectly adapted for what it's doing."

Gwen listened with shock at what the doctor had to say, as did Gary and Lucy. Lucy asked with curiosity, "Is there any way to replicate this in someone else? Could it happen to someone else?"

The doctor shrugged and answered, "I've tried with Tonya's DNA, but I wasn't successful despite the close relation. I suppose it could happen again in someone else, but it seems well beyond our current understanding."

Gwen then asked, "But...you can stop and reverse this, right? Surely there's a way to return my daughter to normal again, isn't there?"

Jen groaned lightly. Even if it were possible, their entire family would likely have to move and live under false names - on Mars. Normality at this point for her family was pretty much a pipe dream.

The doctor shook her head and bluntly responded, "Reversing Jen's growth is out of the question. We simply don't have anything capable of doing so. And while there may be a way to stop her growth, it would almost undoubtedly kill her as it would neutralize...whatever it is that's allowing her body to survive as it is. It's even possible that the only way to stop her growth would be to kill her, and I'm not even sure what that would take. Not to mention disposing of her body."

Jen said, "Uh...yeah, I think I'd much rather keep on living if it's all the same to everyone. Besides, I...think nothing short of a nuke is likely to destroy me now, and the town is going to be worse off."

Gwen just sat down, a bit distraught that her hopes had been fully quashed. Jen would remain giant for the rest of her life, however long that would last. She had no choice. She had to accept what Jen had become, just like her friends had. But she couldn't help but wonder... Just how big would Jen get by the weekend?

Interestingly, Jen was also pondering this. If this was going to continue, she wanted to at least see her dad, James, and her brother before she got like country size or larger. But maybe she could arrange for them to come home sooner herself. She could personally retrieve them, that was true. But maybe she didn't need to?
155321222222.title: The results are in...
